title: 26 Honest Cat Memes All Cat Pawrents Can Immediately Understand
description: All cat pawrents know it's sometimes weird to have a cat. Not the actual having-a-cat thing, because everyone should have a cat in our opinion, but it brings with it a lot of weirdness that doesn't exist in the lives of other people who are not cat pawrents. For example, we all meow to our cats like we're fluent in their language, even if we're not. And for instance, we might find ourselves replacing expensive cat food, that's supposed to be a delicious treat, because our cat decided it's not fancy enough for them. Just the weird occurrences of having a cat.If we're honest, it really is weird having a cat sometimes. But at least all of us cat pawrents understand each other. That's why we gathered all these relatable cat memes that are brutally honest - because we all need to feel understood about our pawrenting. We all want to know we're not the only ones who meow more than our cat. We all want to know we're not the only ones who need to replace the not-fancy-enough feast for our cat.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 26 Honest Cat Memes All Cat Pawrents Can Immediately Understand - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
All cat pawrents know it's sometimes weird to have a cat. Not the actual having-a-cat thing, because everyone should have a cat in our opinion, but it brings with it a lot of weirdness that doesn't exist in the lives of other people who are not cat pawrents. For example, we all meow to our cats like we're fluent in their language, even if we're not. And for instance, we might find ourselves replacing expensive cat food, that's supposed to be a delicious treat, because our cat decided it's not fancy enough for them. Just the weird occurrences of having a cat.

If we're honest, it really is weird having a cat sometimes. But at least all of us cat pawrents understand each other. That's why we gathered all these relatable cat memes that are brutally honest - because we all need to feel understood about our pawrenting. We all want to know we're not the only ones who meow more than our cat. We all want to know we're not the only ones who need to replace the not-fancy-enough feast for our cat.
